name: Apple Developer Signing Certificate Request File

description: You will need to upload your CERTSIGNINGREQUEST file to "https://developer.apple.com" (you'll need an Apple ID to login). This is necessary in order to request a Development and Distribution Certificate that enables you to generate .IPA files, which are needed for final distribution and uploading of your app(s) to Apple.

To create the CERTSIGNINGREQUEST file: Select Keychain Access → Certificate Assistant → Request a Certificate From a Certificate Authority... . Enter the appropriate information in the fields, click Continue . Name your file (or leave it as the default "CertificateSigningRequest" name), choose the save location, and click Save then Done .

common_filenames.description: CertificateSigningRequest.certSigningRequest - The default name for your CERTSIGNINGREQUEST file.
